content: [emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You reach an enormous open area in the caves. The walls are all illuminated by sea-flora. Cyrina stops swimming to gracefully float in the water next to you.

[sound:giggle02|emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“This is where mother and I live! Let me go get her!” She gives your hand a squeeze before she darts off into one of the passageways.
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:false]You feel your heart rate quicken followed by a sinking feeling in your stomach...
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:false]Suddenly a deafening growl shakes the entire cave. Even the flora lining the walls begin to close and hide away…
[sound:giggle01|emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:true|zoomin:true]Out of desperation you pull your diver flare, the red light bouncing off every surface until you see her again…
[emotion:bigmad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“Well… hello there… diver…” Her toothy smile quickly turns your relief into dread as you scramble to find the exit…

[emotion:bigmad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true] “Oh, I don’t think so… My mother is hungry…” She cackles and you feel a constricting force around your waist as the giant tentacle drags you further and further down into the abyss…
